mapper.update: update dataset_info set view_num=view_num +1 where id=#{id}
update dataset_info set subscribe_num=subscribe_num+1 where id=#{datasetInfoId}
update dataset_info set subscribe_num=subscribe_num-1 where id=#{datasetInfoId}
update dataset_info set collect_num=collect_num+1 where id=#{datasetInfoId}
update dataset_info set collect_num=collect_num-1 where id=#{datasetInfoId}
update dataset_info set download_num=download_num+1 where id=#{datasetInfoId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN is_public = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS publicNum FROM dataset_info;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(COALESCE(update_time, create_time), '%Y-%m') AS month, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(LAST_DAY(COALESCE(update_time, create_time)), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AS firstDay, COUNT(*) AS count FROM dataset_info GROUP BY month, firstDay ORDER BY month;
